definition: double/twice/simultaneous/holding two or more (official) posts at the same time
to include and monopolize many things/all-embracing

sentences.english: Only by being open and inclusive can a country prosper and can our continent prosper.
sentences.chinese: 只有开放兼容，国家才能富强，亚欧大陆才能兴旺。

sentences.english: There, you have compatibility across the board.
sentences.chinese: 因为它拥有跨平台的兼容性。

sentences.english: The software runs compatibly with many machines.
sentences.chinese: 这个软件与许多机器兼容运行。

sentences.english: A major number indicates a potential incompatibility between library versions.
sentences.chinese: 主版本号表明程序库版本之间的潜在不兼容性。

sentences.english: Tracks are not compatible with LEGO 9V trains.
sentences.chinese: 曲目与乐高不兼容9V的列车。

sentences.english: After all, these enterprises often have made large investments in an infrastructure that is only compatible with IE.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，这些企业的很多基础设施投入只能和IE兼容。

sentences.english: It will deliver innovative new features while focusing on application and device compatibility.
sentences.chinese: 它将带给大家全新的兼容性更强的新功能。

sentences.english: America's comparative advantage has always been its openness and inclusiveness.
sentences.chinese: 美国相对的优点曾经是他的开放和兼容。

sentences.english: It analyses the compatibility and inter-operability of ETC lane equipment.
sentences.chinese: 其中，重点分析了ETC车道设备兼容互换性问题。

sentences.english: This version resolved most problems such as uninstallation and stability.
sentences.chinese: 这个版本解决了大多数例如卸载和兼容性的问题。

sentences.english: SG2 The product-component interfaces, both internal and external, are compatible.
sentences.chinese: 产品组件的接口，包括内部和外部的，都是兼容。

sentences.english: Schema update fails if the schemas are not compatible.
sentences.chinese: 如果模式不兼容，模式更新就会失败。

sentences.english: Type expansion is a little riskier than the previous backward-compatible choices.
sentences.chinese: 类型扩展与前面的向后兼容策略比起来显得有些冒险。

sentences.english: Cockpits are night vision goggle compatible.
Are the standards compatible with national quality award criteria?
sentences.chinese: 系列标准是否和国家质量奖的准则兼容？

sentences.english: And I have to choose a compatible orientation.
sentences.chinese: 然后选择一个兼容的定向。

definition: to use anywhere, anytime (card, ticket etc)/to be used by everyone (language, textbook etc)/(of two or more things) interchangeable
a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
to exploit (a resource)/to open up (for development)/to develop
